Package DataProcessing

Class DataOperator

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<V>
javafx.concurrent.Task
DataProcessing.DataOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture, javafx.concurrent.Worker, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class DataOperator
extends javafx.concurrent.Task

This class store the variables of sql information and read-in csv data list. Methods are provided to read in data from csv, create table in database and insert data. This class also provide a demo method main to call functions to read csv, create table, execute sql sentences.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.2
Author:
Ruibin CHEN
date
2021/1/24-22:10

    • readCsvFile

      public void readCsvFile​(java.lang.String filePath)
      readCsvFile

      This method can be used to read data from a selected csv file. The first line of the csv file is treated as headers and store in list headers. The rest lines are values and stored in the list csvList. And finally call checkType function check the attributes type in database, store in the list typeList

      Parameters:
      filePath - The selected csv file location on the computer.
      date
      2021/1/24-22:31
